mutants.code:
def triangular_num(n):
    total_sum = 1
    curr_level_sum = 0
    num = 0
    level = 0
    while n > 0:
        level += 1
        curr_level_sum = 0
        for i in range(level):
            if n > 0:
                num += 1
                curr_level_sum += num
                n -= 1
            else:
                break
        print('Level', level, 'Sum:', curr_level_sum)
        total_sum += curr_level_sum
    return total_sum
